property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature wins all battles. (No matter how much greater the opponent's creature's power is, the opponent's creature loses the battle. If both creatures battling have this ability, neither is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Cross Gear] The crossed creature gets +3000 power. When the crossed creature attacks and isn't blocked, put the top card of your deck face-down into your shield zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Liquid People This creature can't be blocked. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Return all creatures in the battle zone to their owner's hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Demon Command. When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Afterwards, both players put all cards in their mana zone into their graveyard except darkness cards. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: All your opponent's creatures gain "Blocker". Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed Attacker You may cross your cross gears with this creature without paying their cost. -Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Cross Gear] The crossed creature gains "Power Attacker +5000", breaks 1 additional shield, and becomes an Armored Dragon in addition to its other races.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Mystery Totem No one may use the "Shield Trigger" of the shields this creature breaks. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Cross Gear] The power of the crossed creature is doubled. If this creature has 6000 or more power, it gains Double Breaker. If this creature has 15000 or more power, it gains Triple Breaker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Angel Command The opponent's creatures are put in the battle zone tapped. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you have no shields, all your creatures gain "Blocker". Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, the opponent may return 1 of their creatures in the battle zone to their hand. If they do, return this creature to your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker Creatures with "Speed Attacker" may not attack the turn they are put in the battle zone. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Death Puppet When the opponent discards cards from their hand, you may draw the amount they discarded.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of the opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone get -2000 power. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution: Put on one of your Melt Warrior Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Destroy all your opponent's creatures that have 3000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Double Breaker When this creature is destroyed, destroy all creatures that have 4000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. This creature gets +1000 power for each card in your mana zone. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 1 card for each race you have other than Mystery Totem in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. This creature does not untap at the start of your turn. When the opponent attacks, untap this creature at the end of that turn. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : When you put this creature or any of your other creatures into the battle zone, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the opponent's hand and discard all darkness and fire spells from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: No one may view the contents of decks. When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} If there are 6 or more creatures in the battle zone, destroy all of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If the opponent has more cards in their hand than you, draw until you have the same number of cards as them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, draw 2 extra cards. At the end of your turn, tap 2 of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked. Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : When this creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. When the opponent casts a fire or nature spell, choose 2 cards in the opponent's mana zone and return them to the owner's hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When this creature blocks, you may put a non-evolution creature with "Blocker" into the battle zone tapped. If you do, return this creature to your hand and instead the tapped creature you put in the battle zone battles the attacking creature. This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear: Put this card in the battle zone when cast. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone. When the crossed creature attacks and isn't blocked, you may return one creature in the battle zone to the owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: All of the opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone get -1000 power. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : This creature gets +7000 power and gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: The opponent cannot cast a light or nature spell of the same name as a spell in their graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose 1 of your opponent's tapped creatures and destroy it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The opponent's cards are put in the mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear: Put this card in the battle zone when cast. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone. When the crossed creature is destroyed, you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all opponent's creatures that have "Blocker" and 3000 or less power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When the opponent casts a light or water spell, destroy one of the opponent's light or water creatures that has 5000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : While this creature is tapped, all of your creatures gain "Power Attacker +3000" and "Double Breaker".

card.name: Metal Cook, the Exploding Flame Chef

property.name: Rules
property.value: All creatures in the battle zone may attack untapped multi-color creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, put 1 card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose creatures that have a combined power of 5000 or less and destroy them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, choose 1 card in your mana zone and return it to your hand. Afterwards, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Water and darkness spells cost 2 more to cast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : You can put an evolution creature of any race on this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When creatures that have a greater power than this creature are put into the battle zone, put this creature in your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When a player draws their card at the start of their turn, that player may place 1 card from their hand into the owner's mana zone. This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Reveal the top 6 cards of your deck. Put all evolution creatures from the revealed cards into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Metamorph (When your mana zone has 7 or more cards, this creature gains the following [Metamorph] ability). [Metamorph] : When this creature attacks, you may return all light spells in your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all the cards in your mana zone, are light cards, this creature gets +2500 power, and gains "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature gets -1000 power for each fire or darkness creature in the battle zone. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.) This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: If your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} If your opponent has more cards in their mana zone than you have in yours, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear: Put this card in the battle zone when cast. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone. The crossed creature gets +1500 power and gains "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature attacks, choose 1 of your opponent's creatures with a power lower than this creature and return it to the owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack. [Metamorph] : This creature gets +2000 power. [Metamorph] : This creature's "This creature can't attack" effect is canceled.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets -1000 power for each fire or nature creature in the battle zone. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.) This creature can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all the cards in your mana zone are water cards, this creature gets +1000 power. When this creature attacks, if all the cards in your mana zone are water cards, draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Cross Gear: Put this card in the battle zone when cast. To cross this card with a creature, pay this card's cost again. When that creature leaves the battle zone, this card remains in the battle zone. When the crossed creature would be destroyed, return it to your hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The creature gets -1000 power for each light or nature creature in the battle zone. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all the cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, this creature gets +2000 power. When this creature attacks, if all the cards in your mana zone are darkness cards, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard your entire hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose 1 of your opponent's tapped creatures. That creature gets -3000 power until the end of the turn. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: The opponent chooses 1 card in his hand and discards it. [Metamorph] : Instead of the opponent choosing their discard, look at the opponent's hand, and discard 1 card from it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Cross Gear] When the crossed creature wins a battle, destroy it. The crossed creature gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all the cards in your mana zone are fire cards, this creature gets +1000 power and gains "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: All dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gets -1000 power for each light or water creature in the battle zone. (A creature that has 0 or less power is destroyed.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose 1 of your opponent's cross gears and put it in the owner's graveyard. Afterwards, if the creature crossed with that cross gear has 2000 or less power, destroy it as well.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: [Cross Gear] Instead of having the crossed creature attack, you may tap it to use its [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Destroy 1 of your opponent's creatures that has 2000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is blocked, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: While all the cards in your mana zone are nature cards, this creature gets +4000 power, gains "Double Breaker", and can't be blocked by any creature that has 5000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: During this turn, when your creatures attack you may select 1 of your opponent's untapped creatures that has "Blocker". That creature must block if possible, and your other creatures can't be blocked by other blockers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: The next creature you summon this turn costs 3 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.

property.value: [Cross Gear] The crossed creature gains "Power Attacker +3000". When the crossed creature is blocked, break one of your opponent's shields.
